Body:
"""Test the CLI with the --verbose flag."""
runner = CliRunner(echo_stdin=True)
verbose_result = runner.invoke(jobautomate.commandline.cli, ['--debug',
    '--verbose', 'Homer', 'Simpson', 'Chunkylover53@aol.com',
    'Nuclear Technician', '.travis.yml'], input='no')
assert not verbose_result.exception
